fees.description:
$39.95 (inc. GST) Special Meter Read fee. This fee is passed through from your distributor and may vary.
You must pay us any fees your distributor passes through to us in relation to services performed by your distributor (or anyone else) at your supply address. For details on additional fees that may apply, please visit www.covau.com.au/additionalfees
$49.32 (inc. GST) fee may apply when your property is disconnected. This fee is passed through from your distributor and may vary.
$48.60 (inc. GST) fee may apply when your property is reconnected. This fee is passed through from your distributor and may vary.
$2.75 (inc. GST) Direct Credit or Debit dishonour payment fee
A 0.73% (inc. GST) fee may apply to payments made by debit and credit cards.

electricityContract.terms: See our full terms and conditions to www.covau.com.au for details.

discounts.description: Discounts applied to GST inclusive energy usage charges. No discount will apply to the GreenPower component.

electricityContract.variation: We may vary your rates in line with our Terms and Conditions at any time by written notice to you. Notice will be given at least 5 business days prior to the variation.

incentives.eligibility: $50 credit applied to you and your friends account if you signup using a Refer a Friend link from an existing CovaU customer. Applies to new customers only who switch their electricity to CovaU. T&Cs apply, refer to https://covau.com.au/refer.

eligibility.information: This offer is available to residential customers who are located within the relevant distribution area with the appropriate network tariff(s) and metering installation and configuration. For more details about the eligibility criteria, please contact CovaU on 1300 689 866.

greenPowerCharges.description: For an extra 1.375c /kWh inc. GST 25% of your usage will come from GreenPower Providers. No discount will apply to the GreenPower component.
For an extra 2.75c /kWh inc. GST 50% of your usage will come from GreenPower Providers. No discount will apply to the GreenPower component.
For an extra 5.5c /kWh inc. GST 100% of your usage will come from GreenPower Providers. No discount will apply to the GreenPower component.

electricityContract.onExpiryDescription: The agreement continues until terminated by you or us in accordance with our Market Retail Terms & Conditions
